> "This is Lord Perseus.  That is good news indeed." he said.  "Our group is
> enroute to Maximal base in Atlantis."
>
> Talon worried about this decition but regarding the conditions of the 
> group she couldnt protest
>

Lord Elder paused for a moment and then replied, "Understood. I shall remain here until back up arrives. I don't think we should leave the Ark unmanned." Lord Elder coughed and then continued, "Kup, Grimlock and a newcomer called Legacy went after the last remaining Minions, they might need assistance as well."

(TAG: Lord Perseus)

Preston
(NPC: Lord Elder)
